PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-11322017-08-31,  ,  ,  ,  AAFC
ActFarm Income Protection Act
SubjectOrder providing Financial Assistance under the Federal-provincial-territorial AgriRecovery Framework to British Columbia agricultural producers
PrecisOrder authorizing Minister of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada to enter into an AGREEMENT with the province of BRITISH COLUMBIA to provide federal contributions of up to $12.0 million under the Agricultural Disaster Relief Program (AgriRecovery) to assist affected agricultural producers with the extraordinary costs related to the 2017 wildfires.
RegistrationRegistration: UNR/
AttachmentsAttachment
